title: Skip Customer Sign-In and Open Add Request from Landing

requirements.text: Update the Landing page so that clicking the "Access Customer Portal" button navigates directly to the customer "Add Request" form page instead of the Customer Sign In page.

quotes:
Remove this page 
Once click Access Customer Portal
Should open add request page

acceptanceCriteria: From route "/", clicking "Access Customer Portal" navigates to "/customer/request".
The intermediate customer sign-in screen is not shown during this flow.

requirements.text: Remove the Customer Sign In page from the app routing and ensure any existing redirects that previously went to "/customer/signin" instead route users to the customer request page.

quotes:
Remove this page 
Once click Access Customer Portal
Should open add request page

acceptanceCriteria: The route "/customer/signin" is no longer registered in the router.
Any code paths that navigate to "/customer/signin" (e.g., customer session guard behavior) navigate to "/customer/request" instead.
Visiting "/customer/signin" in the browser no longer shows the Customer Sign In screen (it should result in Not Found or redirect to "/customer/request" per the updated routing).

requirements.text: Update the post-submit success screen in the Customer Request flow so that the primary return action does not send users to a page that requires the removed sign-in flow.
acceptanceCriteria: After submitting a request and seeing the success screen, the return button navigates to a valid page that does not depend on the removed customer sign-in route (e.g., "/" or "/customer/request").
No navigation from the customer request flow leads to "/customer/signin".

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Changing backend Motoko logic or adding new backend endpoints.
Adding new authentication providers or login methods.
Redesigning the admin area or admin routes.
